title: Learner-Centered MOOC Instructional Method Evaluation and Design Improvement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Long-Term MOOC Program Operators and Instructors for Corporate Scientific Talent Development

learning_goals: The effectiveness of MOOC content can be systematically diagnosed using the Learner-Centered Instructional Evaluation Framework (MEF).
MOOC design improvement directions can be derived by applying a mixed-methods research approach (quantitative/qualitative evaluation).
The reliability and utility of assessment tools can be validated through expert review and field testing.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
